Auth.CarouselText1: All your producers in one place.

Auth.CarouselText4: All your beats in one place.

Login.askForRegister: No account yet? Register here for free.

Step1.letsStart: A small step for you, but a big step for your career. Register for free and create your masterpiece. We will guide you step by step through the registration process.
Step1.askForLogin: Already have an account? You can log in here.
Step1.invalidEmailError: Please enter a valid e-mail address
Step1.under18Error: You must be at least 16 years old.

Step2.PasswordText: Stealing beats is bad enough, but what about your account? Choose a strong password to avoid data theft.

Validate.InvalidEmailError: Please enter a valid email address.
Validate.Under16Error: You must be at least 16 years old.
Validate.SuccessSignUp: Sign up successful! You can now log in.
Validate.ErrorSignUp: Error during sign up. Please try again.
Validate.ErrorSignIn: Error during sign in. Please check your credentials and try again.
Validate.PasswordLetterError: The password must contain at least one letter.
Validate.PasswordNumberError: The password must contain at least one number.
Validate.PasswordSpecialCharError: The password must contain at least one special character.
Validate.PasswordGuidelinesText: We have certain password guidelines that you must meet.
